## Quaternion.transform() method

Rotate a vector

**Signature:**

```typescript
transform(v: Vector3, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The vector to be rotated. |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector, if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The rotation result.
